com.example.datahelper

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.datahelper.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that handle data transfer between the app and firebase

    • Field Summary

      private UserState userState

      private DatabaseHelper()
      This is the constructor of database helper which initialize the firebase instance and set up values for interacting.
